__e: He thinks he has a kidney condition and he's doing quite well.
She's saying that our perfectly healthy daughter started the day sharing three kidneys and now she only has one which isn't even working... which basically means, she has none.
I have two kidneys, and they say you can live with one, so...
Her father is very ill. The poor man's kidneys have failed.
More importantly, her kidneys are shutting down and we don't know why.
But her kidneys are in such bad shape, the dialysis only helped a little.
You make a sound, and I'll put a round in this man's liver, and he will die slowly.
He had his mother's eyes and his father's kidneys.
